duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with stakeholders to tailor QA processes to specific needs and proactively identify project risks related to quality.
Champion and promote the understanding of the latest trends, technologies, and advancements in QA and software testing.
Establish and evaluate Objectives & Key Results (OKRs) and performance metrics for QA initiatives, providing regular reports to stakeholders.
Provide leadership and direction to multiple teams through senior managers, developing mid to long-term plans to execute strategies in Quality Assurance.
Define and implement the overall QA vision, frameworks, and processes to ensure the effective delivery of high-quality software products and solutions.
Manage quality platforms and tools, migrate testing processes from legacy mindsets to automated practices, and drive the adoption of QA methodologies and tools through training and support.
Validate compliance with architecture and integration standards set by the Enterprise Architecture and Integration CoE groups.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or Computer Engineering (Master's may be required at higher levels)
